scripts.db:migrate: for f in ./migrations/*.sql; do wrangler d1 execute ${API_CORE_D1_DATABASE:-${D1_DATABASE:-heaven-api}} --local --file=$f; done
scripts.db:migrate:remote: for f in ./migrations/*.sql; do wrangler d1 execute ${API_CORE_D1_DATABASE:-${D1_DATABASE:-heaven-api}} --remote --file=$f; done
scripts.seed: bun run scripts/seed.ts && wrangler d1 execute ${API_CORE_D1_DATABASE:-${D1_DATABASE:-heaven-api}} --local --file=./scripts/seed.sql
scripts.seed:remote: bun run scripts/seed.ts && wrangler d1 execute ${API_CORE_D1_DATABASE:-${D1_DATABASE:-heaven-api}} --remote --file=./scripts/seed.sql
